name: Rolling With The Punches
description:
Rolling With The Punches! How to Play: 

Prepare yourself for battle! Customize your Type dice and Power dice to try to out roll your opponent. 

The Type dice is compared to your opponent and follows traditional Rock, Paper, Scissors but with an added type that covers all 3.

The Power dice is compared to your opponents and modified by your type roll. A winning type means more damage!

Click and drag faces to you dice to change the loadout!

After defeating an opponent drag your won dice faces to the Mogus inventory teleported to access them on the dice customization screen!

Pay attention to your opponent's type dice loadout to stack your odds! (NOTE: A bug caused the enemies Types to not update, please reference the image below when preparing for battle!)

When you're ready for battle hit the "Battle!" button. Turns will auto play until there is only one left standing. Will it be you?

Narrative:

"King Blocky received news of a disturbance in his land. He discovered that some of his subjects had risen against him and wanted to overthrow him!

It is now up to you to help him fight these enemies with your trusty dice and reclaim your kingdom!"

"Rolling With The Punches" is an auto-battler combat game where you use dice to determine your attack's type and damage points. Use stickers dropped by enemies to customize your dice and turn the chances in your favor!

This game was made within a span of just 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme "Roll Of The Dice" Team: • Khevan Thanki -  3D Art, Game Design (khevan.itch.io) • Blast - Ben Allen -  Programming, Game Design, 2D Art (blast.itch.io) • Murten -  Programming, Game Design (murten101.itch.io) • Amadeus Herrera - Music, SFX (amadeusherrera.itch.io) External Assets Used: 1.
